sentence.Network_en: One morning when a vixen was taking her babies out of the lair, she saw a lioness and her cub.
sentence.Network_cn: 一天清早,雌狐狸带着她的孩子走出巢穴, 看见了母狮子和她的孩子.

sentence.Network_en: Although a vicious hunter, the lioness was as gentle as a dove when playing with her cubs.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管那只母狮是猎食其他动物的凶残的野兽, 但它同自己的幼崽玩耍时却非常温顺.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... goddess 女神 lioness 母狮 leopardess 母豹.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... lintel 楣,楣石 lioness 雌狮 lionize 崇拜，看重.
英语构词法 - 搜搜百科 ... actress 女演员， lioness 母狮子 mouthful 一口，.
英语构词法(人教版高三英语下册教学论文) ... actress( 女演员) lioness( 雌狮子) waitress( 女服务员).

list.abs: lioness rejected the smallest cub , which died., 母狮排斥最小的幼狮 , 把它饿死了.
She started to pace the office like a lioness in a cage ., 她开始在办公室里走来走去 , 就像笼子里的一只母狮子.
A lioness with her young ., 带小狮的母狮.
While Orlando was engaged with lioness , Oliver awaked., 奥兰多跟母狮子搏斗的时候 , 奥列佛醒了.

entry.def: A lioness is a female lion.

auth_sentence.content: Though the Leopard in the tree having its tea and the Lioness's walking past the Landrover made up for it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Though the Leopard in the tree having its tea and the Lioness's walking past the Landrover made up for it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Though the Leopard in the tree having its tea and the Lioness's walking past the Landrover made up for it.

auth_sentence.content: Less than six months after her premature passing, fans now have Lioness: Hidden Treasures to remind them of what they're missing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Less than six months after her premature passing, fans now have Lioness: Hidden Treasures to remind them of what they're missing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Less than six months after her premature passing, fans now have Lioness: Hidden Treasures to remind them of what they're missing.

auth_sentence.content: In May, rangers were forced to shoot a lioness after it stalked an upmarket Nairobi neighbourhood for months.
auth_sentence.res_content: In May, rangers were forced to shoot a lioness after it stalked an upmarket Nairobi neighbourhood for months.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In May, rangers were forced to shoot a lioness after it stalked an upmarket Nairobi neighbourhood for months.

stems_affixes.word_buile: godd=god神+ess女性,雌性→n.女神;绝世美女
mayor市长+ess女性,雌性→n.市长夫人,女市长
mistress[[n.主妇,女主人,女能人,情妇]]跣础鷑.小姐,姑娘
miss小姐,姑娘+is→小姐或姑娘最终都会变成太太或妻子

stems_affixes.value_cn: 主妇,女主人,女能人,情妇
stems_affixes.word_buile: mister先生+ess女性,雌性→mistress主妇,女主人
